name: Kirby's Dream Land 2 (3DS)
description:
Original Release Date: May 1995

Kirby™ returns and has joined forces with new friends in this thrilling
sequel!

The Rainbow Bridges that connect the seven Rainbow Islands have
disappeared! Help Kirby solve the mystery! Search through the different
islands while battling King DeDeDe and his horde of evil minions.

Along the way, meet Rick the Hamster, Kine the Fish, and Coo the Owl.
Each possesses important abilities that can multiply the magnitude of
Kirby's powers! Earn the mysterious Rainbow Sword, and prepare to face
Kirby's most menacing rival ever--the evil Dark Matter!
This game is only playable in 2D.This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
